website_summaries.verdict: Who could resist an adorable Tootsie Roll costume? This option is cute enough to eat and easy for babies to wear.
pros: Cute and fun costume design that is perfect for immobile babies
Easy to put on and has a cozy coordinating hat
Roomy enough on most babies to wear with a onesie underneath for extra warmth and comfort
cons: Only size appropriate for small babies and not toddlers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This costume is such good value for money and has plenty of space for baby’s body. There are definitely a few areas for improvement such as an easier way to get on and off as all it had to aid in that process were 2 tiny pieces of Velcro. Also, the head hole was quite small; I bought this for a 4 month old who has a smaller head and this was extremely tight in that area. Despite those 2 issues, it’s a well made costume and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a Halloween costume for their little.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mason

customer_reviews.title: Sweetest Toosie Roll Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece's 7 week old son, he was the sweetest tootsie roll around !!! The costume fit well but the head area was a little tight to get over his head even though he is only 10 lbs. The costume was very long so there would be enough room if your child is older, the hat fit good. The only thing to keep in mind is you can't wash and as we all know you want to wash everything before you put it on a newborn. All in all the costume made everybody smile when they looked at him.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Because of the bunting style, this fits my extra long 3 month old perfectly. It’s light weight and soft so it will be perfect for our church’s indoor Halloween celebration. Their customer services have been extremely and attentive. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Liaboe

customer_reviews.title: sweet treat
customer_reviews.text: listed as 3-9, but fits more like 6-9. but it is a cute costume, my daughter got lots of love when people saw her on halloween.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy baby costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume hasn't actually been used for Halloween yet...I bought it a little early. It looks like it will fit my daughter just fine for trick-or-treating, in length and width. The face hole looks small (just like I read in other reviews) but I plan to cut it bigger if it doesn't fit. I think it is a very cute costume, it's made of felt-like material. The Tootsie Roll words were discolored when I got it. (It was folded and the brown felt dye rubbed off on it) Overall I think it's a good buy - it's cute and easy to slip on baby for one night of fun.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! It has held up well over the years. My daughter used it for her first Halloween and then two years later my nephew used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda606

customer_reviews.title: This fit my daughter well. It fits smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: This fit my daughter well. It fits smaller than expected. Once I took it out of the package I expected it to be much to big on my daughter but in fact it was about the right size. Still worth the money though and very cute for a little one!
customer_reviews.author: KindleFan

customer_reviews.title: Super big but cute
customer_reviews.text: Cue but runs very very big. It was cold so our baby had layers.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Thralls

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable for my 3 month old. Plenty of room even if he was a few month older. Wound up cutting the back so I could put it on him in the stroller
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Velez

customer_reviews.title: Logo on incorrect side
customer_reviews.text: This was incorrectly made. The tootsie roll logo was on the back and not the front as pictured. It was not a useable costume as it made baby look like a brown sack when facing up for photos and such. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bottom part is not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part is not like the picture. I wish it was made with stretch bands in order to create that wrapper twist effect instead of a small piece of velcro which doesn't really do anything to create that effect. And, some of threads are loose. But no biggie cause we had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Abbyfish

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for infants
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for infants. Still dressed them in pants and long sleeve shirt since it was cold, but definitely keeps them warmer than other outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The head area is small - we solved by cutting ...
customer_reviews.text: The head area is small - we solved by cutting around the face area, little stretch cuts on each side. very cute.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Quality,  super cute
customer_reviews.text: My baby was the cutest and was only 3 months only at the time. Lol smh super cute! I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This was an adorable costume. It fit about as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was an adorable costume. It fit about as expected, my son was 10 months old at the time but a little small for his age. He didn't care for the headpiece, we just put it behind him and he was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Pawa

customer_reviews.title: Meh it was okay.
customer_reviews.text: worked... tight around her throat with the head part up. had a hole near the tag, and ripped when i tried to stretch it in the neck area.
customer_reviews.author: CeaAnne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for a cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dreaming of having a baby for a tootsie roll costume for my baby since forever! It arrived earlier than expected and it looks so cute on her cant wait for Halloween. Nice quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Best

customer_reviews.title: Love IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could post a picture. This was my daughters first Halloween, and she received so many compliments. I couldn't believe how adorable she looked. I got the 6 month old one and it fit her perfectly. I was even able to put clothes on underneath. I will definitely look for more costumes like this one.
customer_reviews.author: NoodleDoddle

customer_reviews.title: Trick or Treat tootsie!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters first Halloween costume. Fit perfectly and I was able to put her in a sleeper underneath for extra warmth and she still had room to move her legs around. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute.!!!...Just didn't like the closure at the bottom. Could have made a closure for the middle so their little legs could hang comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UNBEATABLE PRICE ...VERY CUTE COSTUME.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. Its of nice quality and fit well. My baby is 1 week shy of 3 months, so I was worried, because all the reviews say it was huge. It's just long, but it's supposed to cover their legs. I am very pleased with this purchase and my son looks too cute.
customer_reviews.author: J. Troxclair

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but cute!
customer_reviews.text: Baby was adorable Tootsie Roll and many compliments were received. However, custom was much thinner than expected. but did get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Helena Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was 4 almost 5 months and it fit her perfectly! Such a cute costume. She weighted 18 pounds & was 25-26 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Xyooj

customer_reviews.title: Cute little outfit
customer_reviews.text: Really cute outfit for Halloween. The only thing that we had issues with was the little face area. There was some give but it was tight to get around her face. But over all we loved her in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old daughter was so cute in this costume! She wore it for about an hour while we took her to a few houses trick or treating and took some pictures. The face hole was fine, the costume was a little long, and she kept kicking at it, but it fit great. It was also nice and warm - we just put a long sleeved onsie under it and she was dressed for the fall weather. It wasn't the highest quality, but for an inexpensive first Halloween costume I thought it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute. My daughter was able to fit in it and she turns 2 in 2 months. My 3 month old also fits in it, and it's not that big on her. The hat is pretty dmall, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace

customer_reviews.title: So stinking cute!
customer_reviews.text: So stinking cute! It kept my little one warm while trick or treating with her older sister.
customer_reviews.author: Khatmom3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 month old. He is tall for his age it fit him perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: The Sweetest Tootsie Roll ever
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST costume for my grandson. The fabric is very soft and mild on the skin and very warm. We attended a Halloween party so all we put on under neath was a Onesie. He was the Sweetest Tootsie Roll Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: Very cute costume. I washed this costume once before ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume. I washed this costume once before wearing and again after the first wearing. It held up very well. My grandson is 4 months old and the it fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: We didn't use it
customer_reviews.text: The size says 0-6 months but it's HUGE! I intended to have my 2 month old wear it for her first Halloween and it was far too large. At the rate my LO is growing I don't think she'd be big enough for it by 6 months and I've never met a baby that would fit this costume at that age either.
customer_reviews.author: tinybanana

customer_reviews.title: My son looks adorable in his tootsie roll costume!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered this for my son's first Halloween. He looks just precious as a tootsie roll and the costume fits well. He is 3 months old and about 13 lbs. No probs with the head as I'd read in other reviews. This outfit prob wouldnt be good for much bigger children so that it is marketed up 'til 9 months is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Munchkin's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Such an adorable costume! Definitely a 1 time use because you ...
customer_reviews.text: Such an adorable costume! Definitely a 1 time use because you cannot wash the costume. Got so many compliments and my son loved that he could kick around in it! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Tafs

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 month old. She looks so cute in it! Love that it is stretchy around the face. She has a chubby face so it fits great. It is made well. It will keep her warm while out trick or treating. =O)
customer_reviews.author: Mrsbean2u

customer_reviews.title: Tootsie's are good.
customer_reviews.text: This went over great with the inlaws. Though at first they thought my daughter was the flying nun. It was comfortable however, and my sensitive newborn enjoyed herself, and that's what counts :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter looks awesome in this costume. It has more than enough room to put a thermal on underneath to keep her warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute !
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute ,great size ...letters could have been better quality but still super cute !
customer_reviews.author: christina ona

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good costume!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous buying this costume because of some of the reviews, but I went ahead and purchased it anyway. And I'm glad I did! My son, who was 7 months old and 18 lbs at the time, fit into this perfectly. The hole for the face stretches quite a bit, so no worries. And yes, the red bleeds into the white of the costume, but for only wearing it once, it was a pretty good costume! He was the perfect little tootsie roll and got rave reviews. Phew!
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie25

customer_reviews.title: Super CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This outfit is perfect for my 5 month old! She looks SO cute in it and it's not too thick for those of us that live in warmer climates and can be put over long sleeves to dress warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This costume fit well. Long for my son but he's only 3 months. It's so cute. Soft material. Perfect lettering and coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I loved this costume
customer_reviews.text: I loved this costume! My baby was 4 months old when he wore it. The body of the costume was a little big, but not a big deal. His face fit perfectly in the opening. For the price, I thought this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie 81

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my grandson and have not got any feed back from the parents as of yet
customer_reviews.author: damien

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 3 year old is was so large!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest costume!
customer_reviews.text: This says its 3-6 months but if you go by the measurements it fits great! My son is 7 weeks old and it fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect costume for our little tootsie roll!
customer_reviews.author: Julia  Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Very cute and had space to put her in warmer clothes underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for a 6 month old
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT costume for a 6 month old (around 20 lbs.) It fit perfectly!!! The only two down falls to this costume was that it kept my daughter a little too warm so we ended up taking it off right after pictures were taken at the grandma's houses and it is not washable. I hate putting clothes on my daughter without washing them first!
customer_reviews.author: nickel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome, great responses. The hat is the best part
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.text: The 6-12 fit my 18 lbs son perfect & the hood was snug enough to stay put but not to tight. Regular costume material as expected. For the price it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So cute. The fabric is soft and probably was a bit too short for my 11 month old who is quite tall but a little skinny. I know I bought a smaller size, but I had read that it runs big. She didn't try to yank it off so it's comfy for her too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tiu

customer_reviews.title: Baby costume
customer_reviews.text: The baby didn't like it but we thought it was cute :) Only used it for long enough to take a quick picture before she started screaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R. Kelishes

customer_reviews.title: it looks just like it does on the picture and it's well made ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really cute costume but I should went with a smaller size because daughter is a peanut.. it looks just like it does on the picture and it's well made and shipped fast very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: costume
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this costume for my 3 month old daughter at the time, nice and long , really warm but the hole for the baby's head is to small. I had to cut it and make it bigger so that it would still fit her for Halloween. Overall though , good costume I will def use it again on any other child I have.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: A Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: A great costume it fit our 5 mos old son perfectly. Could not have been a more adorable costume! Very happy we chose the Tootsie roll costume.
customer_reviews.author: Silvernblack

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price. When i tried it on my son (10 weeks) it fit, but his foot went through the bottom part and i had to resew it. Not bad for the price. Very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.
customer_reviews.text: My nine month old baby fits well into it. She is average and there is still room if your baby is higher than average weight.
customer_reviews.author: Annu Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume is so funny and cute ANd cheap. Loved it for my 6 month old
customer_reviews.author: amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st Halloween Costume!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 6 month old! Cute and comfy! Great 1st Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.author: Jakia N.

customer_reviews.title: This turned out great!! He is 4 months at the end ...
customer_reviews.text: This turned out great!! He is 4 months at the end of October and it fit just like we wanted!!! I know people talked about the head, but it fits perfect!! He's about 16 pounds now. Everyone has loved it!! We took photos this past weekend
customer_reviews.author: Holly Beytebiere

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have been happier. This fit my 4-month old perfectly, and she looked deliciously adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume
customer_reviews.text: Adorable costume. It fit my baby's head fine (at 5 months), but my baby has a smaller than average head...like...the 10th percentile I think...so if your baby has a larger or average head I might heed the "too small for my baby's head" reviews. Also, the costume is like a sleeper gown, so that is something to think about if you plan to tote them around in anything with a harness type strap like a stroller or baby carrier...hiking the costume up around the legs kind of ruins the look. :)
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The "Tootsie Roll" lettering was on the back of the costume. WTF??
customer_reviews.author: Shaunna

customer_reviews.title: the fun began after it was on
customer_reviews.text: She didn't like this costume going on or coming off, but then again she doesn't like any clothes going on or off. In between those two times she was happy and we loved the costume. She's 9 months and it fit well. Not the most spectacular outfit at the party, but darn cute and funny.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Crafton

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume. Fast shipping decent price.. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume. Fast shipping decent price.. Wish they had a smaller version for 0-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: costume contest winner
customer_reviews.text: Warm, fit our boy of 4 months well, and so cute other costume contestants didn't stand a chance when we entered him into his first contest. 20 bucks well spent.
customer_reviews.author: RJ45man

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 3 stars because it is cute but we couldn't actually use it. My daughter is small (in the 3rd percentile) but at 3 months this is enormous on her, so big that it was not able to be worn. I don't think this would actually fit her until she is about a year old and at that point won't be able to wear a bunting costume. I was disappointed because I wish it would have worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Eliaku

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, but came stained
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and soft but came stained with out enough time to return before we needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Macy

customer_reviews.title: great :)
customer_reviews.text: Great costume for the price! My 6 month old looked adorable :) the only negative thing is the head hole was a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Fast Service!
customer_reviews.text: We really love the item and it was rest assure that the way they describe it, exactly the way we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jhen

customer_reviews.title: tootsie roll
customer_reviews.text: this was just too cute although I do recommend using it for the age its says ( it used it for a newborn because I just couldn't resist). Very cute costume!
customer_reviews.author: brianna cacciato

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really loved it, although it was a little big
customer_reviews.author: Opal Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: We have a small 13 lb 5 month old and she fit it fine, although it was a little long. The costume was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: UGATAP

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to wear when she will be 5 mos., but my 2 year old will be wearing it instead bc it is so long. The fabric is warm for a Halloween night but on a 22" infant, you couldn't tell what it was bc the words were all crumpled up on her
customer_reviews.author: Gaelicgirl

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good costume
customer_reviews.text: It fit good. It was adorable and she received many comments and had a Frankenstein even take a pic w her
customer_reviews.author: Quenbe29

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume although the face opening is a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Adorable costume although the face opening is a bit small. My 6 month old twin with a head circumference of 40.5 cm (which is actually below average) had a hard time fitting her head through. My other twin's head is 39 cm and fit through but was tight and she is not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: TXgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great costume. Can't wait until Halloween for my lil man to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Tootsie Roll
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely adorable. He went to an event at Babies R Us and so many people complimented him. I was extremely pleased with the shipping, packaging, price, fit and feel. I LOVED IT!!!! I have attached a picture as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute but the fabric is cheap felt so it stretches around baby's face
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Scrumptious!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone just wanted to eat my two month old right up when they saw him in this costume! Great purchase! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: The cutest !!!!
customer_reviews.text: He was the life of the party lol I loved this, he even loved it !!! The material wasn’t itchy, it was very soft and he had plenty room !!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

product_meta.title: Rasta Imposta Tootsie Roll Bunting Costume
product_meta.description: The tootsie roll bunting costume is a cute choice for your child this halloween
